overview_of_class: Companion seminar to the Health & Sciences reporting class covers examines the institutions and issues driving the health and technology fields. Class includes field trips to laboratories and other sites and features speakers from science and health fields.
name: Health & Sciences Seminar
title: JOUR JOUR 425-0-20 Health & Sciences Seminar
enrl_requirement: Enrollment Requirements: Only students in the MSJ program may enroll in these classes

descriptions.name: Overview of class
descriptions.value: Companion seminar to the Health & Sciences reporting class covers examines the institutions and issues driving the health and technology fields. Class includes field trips to laboratories and other sites and features speakers from science and health fields.

descriptions.name: Registration Requirements
descriptions.value: MSJ Program Only; prerequisites: Journalism Methods.

subject: JOUR
